summary: Brings the customization capabilities of my Customizer framework to Recorder by potasticpanda! Contains all the options you've come to expect of a CC Customizer.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/3994/g7nhUj.png[/img]

[size=3][url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]https://imageshack.com/a/img924/1402/x3ny5B.jpg[/img][/url][/size]

[size=3][b][color=#93c47d]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/color][/b][/size]

[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Recorder looks. You can change the body textures, face and eyes.[/size]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68683/?]Recorder - Standalone Fully Voiced Follower[/url][/size]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]

[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]meshes\actors\character\recorder[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\[i][color=#6aa84f]actors\character\recorder[/color][/i][/color][/i]. The eyes goes into [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\[/color][/i][color=#6aa84f]actors\character\recorder\eyes[/color].[/i][/size]

[size=6][color=#0B8DB3]Credits[/color][/size]
[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]CBBE Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/i][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]UNP Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40156/?]UNPC Body v2dot5[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35748/?]UNPetite[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Topmodel[/url][/i][/size]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body/Face Texture[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin Texture[/url][/i][/size]

[/font][/center]
author: ClearanceClarence

files.name: Recorder Customizer - CBBE - 1.2.0
files.changelogHtml:
Updated to a new and better version of the framework for the installer
Added Demoniac, SKY Female and Leyenda as a texture options
Removed Mature V1, Milkdrinker and Barbarian textures

files.name: Recorder Customizer - UNP - 1.2.0
files.changelogHtml:

files.name: Recorder Customizer - CBBE - 2.0
files.changelogHtml:
Updated to the latest version of the framework
Added Pride of Valhalla textures
A ton of small updates and tweaks since the last update was over 2 years ago
